EmailInputEdit:
We recommend you get a new Calibration Target on the 3shape store in the following link:

https://webshop.3shape.com/es/accessories


Meanwhile you can use the black cylinder instead to complete the calibration, while you wait the new one to arrive.
Issue: the error messages every time the calibration kit is used, while attempting the color calibration.
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
RC: it was found that the calibration target has expired.
Solution: a hardware test attempt and we confirm the correct functionality of the scanner.
Step 1: Getting error code :?? and Checked if the color calibration kit is mounted properly
Step 10: Hardware Test performed for discard Trios issues
Step 11: Explained to customer the bad result of calibration hardware test
Step 12: Asked to customer to get a new one in the shop
Step 2: Asked to customer if has more scanner explained that TRIOS 4 has different calibration targets
Step 3: Checked if the scanning tip is clean and doesn't have any stains, asked to customer to celan it whit softclothe or compressed air
Step 4: Tried with different clean scan tips
Step 5: Checked if the calibration target (3D calibration tip or Color calibration target) is clean
Step 6: Checked if there are any scratches or other physical damage on the target
Step 7: Tried to do calibration again and failed
Step 8: Color calibration target got checked and it has expired (2024)
Step 9: Accesed into the ScanSuite path and verified scan pictures
